original_text: Kill the other lamb in the evening. Offer it with the same gifts of food and drink as in the morning. It is a burnt offering to the Lord. Its smell pleases him.
korean_text: 한 어린 양은 저녁 때에 드리되 아침에 한 것처럼 소제와 전제를 그것과 함께 드려 향기로운 냄새가 되게 하여 여호와께 화제로 삼을지니

sentences.original_text: Kill the other lamb in the evening.
Offer it with the same gifts of food and drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 아침과 같은 음식과 음료의 예물로 바치라.

sentences.original_text: It is a burnt offering to the Lord.
